== About Me ==

My name is Daniela S. Antonio Hernández. 
I'm Graphic Designer Student in <nowiki>[[http://www.enap.unam.mx|UNAM-ENAP]]</nowiki>. 
I'm an Ubuntu user since November 2008. I joined Ubuntu México LoCo Team on the same year.

* '''Email''': magia154@zoifrik.com
* '''IRC''': magia154@irc.freenode.org
* '''Launchpad''': <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~magia154]]</nowiki>
* '''Sitio''': <nowiki>[[http://www.zoifrik.com]]</nowiki>

== Ubuntu Contributions ==

* I use Ubuntu as my operating system for professional design projects
* I have been involved with the creation of the logo for the podcast of Ubuntu Mexico
* I make tutorials for new users of Ubuntu on <nowiki>[[http://www.youtube.com/vinyltoy|this YouTube Channel]]</nowiki>
* I participated in the <nowiki>[[http://flisol.info/FLISOL2010/Mexico|FLISOL Mexico City 2010]]</nowiki> promoting the use of Ubuntu in ONG's (sede Indesol)
* I'm starting a <nowiki>[[https://www.ubuntudf.org|Local Community of Ubuntu for Mexico City]]</nowiki>
* I'm participating in the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UbuntuOpenWeek_ES|Ubuntu Open Week]]</nowiki> 
* I organized the Ubuntu Release Party 10.04 In Mexico City
 
== My Plans for The Future ==

* Organize more events in Mexico City to spread Ubuntu in all possible areas
* Spread Ubuntu inside Mexico City ONG's
* Continue creating audiovisual materials in Spanish for new users of Ubuntu
* Produce animations for Ubuntu
* Become an Ubuntu Member
* See ubuntu-mx-df LoCoTeam being approved
